title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the number 1 thing holding back the good teams in the NFL from being great this season. He praises Chargers quarterback Justin Herbert for his poise at the end of his comeback win against the Steelers on Sunday night. He also tells you why he was right about the Patriots and wrong about Josh Allen. Plus, Super Bowl champion Drew Brees joins the show to discuss Herbert's greatness and Baker Mayfield's struggles. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
